name: Hide/Cut Post Text
author: Scott Reilly

sections.description: Hide (so no one, or only users above a certain userlevel, can see) or cut (so only viewable on post’s permalink page) portion(s) of post text. Link text for cuts can be defined per-cut or omitted, and if used, cut links are uniquely anchored. Quicktag buttons for the new tags facilitate use (but can be disabled).

short_description: Hide (so no one, or only users above a certain userlevel, can see) or cut (so only viewable on post's permalink page) portion(s) of post text.  Link text for cuts can be defined per-cut or omitted, and if used, cut links are uniquely anchored.  Quicktag buttons for the new tags facilitate use (but can be disabled).
